it.polimi.se2018.networking.server.rmi

Interface RMIClientConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIClientConnImpl

    public interface RMIClientConnection
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Class for RMI client connection, provides the remote interface of the server, used by the client
    Author:
    Pietro Ghiglio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkEnoughPlayers()
      Method remote-called by the client in order in order to check if, after it's own addition, there are enough players to start a game
      void handleRequest(java.lang.String playerName, RMIServerConnection client)
      Method that gets remote-called by the client in order to try to add a player to the game
      void notify(VCAbstractMessage message) 
      void poll()
      Method used to periodically check if the connection is working
      void register(RMIObserver<VCAbstractMessage> observer) 
      void send(MVAbstractMessage message)

      • handleRequest

        void handleRequest(java.lang.String playerName,
                   RMIServerConnection client)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                   UserNameTakenException,
                   GameStartedException
        Method that gets remote-called by the client in order to try to add a player to the game
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player
        client - the remote-object for the client
        Throws:
        UserNameTakenException - when the username is already taken
        GameStartedException - when a game is already started
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • checkEnoughPlayers

        void checkEnoughPlayers()
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method remote-called by the client in order in order to check if, after it's own addition, there are enough players to start a game
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • poll

        void poll()
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to periodically check if the connection is working
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - when there are connection problems
